Most people here know we are under the control of the Illuminati – a term that covers the secret societies that have control of our Government, Media, Entertainment, Banking, Military and have infiltrated and corrupted the three major religions - Judaism, Christianity, and Islam, All of us know the main symbol of these secret societies is the All Seeing Eye. Well listen to this! Yeshua is Jesus in Hebrew – [Yod, Shin, Vav, Ayin] (Sorry I can’t embed the Hebrew letters) The name of Jesus in Hebrew is pronounced Yeshua which means Salvation but there is much more to it. Every letter in Hebrew has multiple meanings, so when the letters are combined to make a word, not only does it have the meaning of the word itself, but has the combined meaning of the letters that comprise the word. When we read letter by letter from right to left, as Hebrew is supposed to be read, this is what happens: • Yod: has a numerical value of 10 and its meanings include: Work, Hand /Arm, Activity, Deed. • Shin: has a numerical value of 300 and its meanings include: Destroy, Consume, Devour • Vav: has a numerical value of 6 and its meanings include: Join, Nail, Establish, Secure, Attach, Man’s number • Ayin: has a numerical value of 70 and its meanings include: Eye, See, Understand This computes to mean: Yeshua – The hand that destroys the establishment of the eye 300+10+70+6= 386. 3+8+6=17 hebrew meaning of #17 equals victory! Illuminati is dead where they stand. Repent and accept Jesus Christ.
Wouter

Do you know why I believe he sells more albums? He does not rely on a bunch of hooks, he doesn't have 1 - 2 original lines and then repeat the same lyric over or sing incomprehensibly so the only words you recognize are bitch, ho, ass, Dom P champagne. No, he does not waste his time with that dishonest crap. He is a wordsmith, just like Beck or Wu Tang, (ok everyone have 1 sec to hate on Beck). His lyrics tell a story if you listen. His songs contain irony, sarcasm, black humor, grit  the stuff of real life lived hard and honest. I picture him writing lyrics and then adding a word, substituting another word, throwing out weak words and massaging words until he has just the right mix with the right sound. Eminem holds the Guinness world record for the greatest number of words in a single hit..his song, Rap God contains 1,560 words. I rest my case people.
